fields.label_info_text:
0: No response 
1: Grimaces 
2: Sneezes coughs/pulls away

0: Blue/Pale all over 
1: Blue/Pale extremities 
2: Normal all over

0: Absent 
1: Weak/Slow irregular breathing 
2: Good cry / RR40

fields.text: Mpatie Mtoto chanjo ya BCG wakati wa udhulio la kwanza la PNC,au mara too chanjo ya BCG ikiwepo.BCG haiwezi kutolewa kwa mtoto ambaye amezidi miezi 12
